commitMessages.message: - Use Oxygen's ro.sync.exml.workspace.api.standalone.ui.ToolbarButton for all buttons - To browse, use Oxygen's ro.sync.exml.workspace.api.WorkspaceUtilities.chooseDirectory() -The working copy should present the the name of the directory and the full path on tooltip 3.1 in the combo's drop down, put the project directory as well (if it is a GIT repository). The project directory can be obtained using: - When you minimize the view some controls are disappearing. Let's put a decent minimum size on the panels. - Status information. The essential status information would be the branch and a status: Up to date, or the revision number. - After Pull, if successful, show an "Up to date" message.
All conflicts fixed but you are still merging. Commit to conclude the merge.
- Listen for changes in Oxygen - Added tree contextual menu - Modified some messages
Treated the case when a repository has just been cloned and there are no commits (it's brand new).
